name: bulk-knowledge-base-ingestion
description: One-time migration script for ingesting historical podcast episodes into Bedrock Knowledge Base

scripts.migrate:dry-run: echo 'Dry run mode not implemented. Use migrate script with caution.'
scripts.check-env: node -e "console.log('Knowledge Base ID:', process.env.KNOWLEDGE_BASE_ID || 'OT4JU2FZZF (default)'); console.log('Data Source ID:', process.env.DATA_SOURCE_ID || 'CVHXBD68AY (default)'); console.log('AWS Profile:', process.env.AWS_PROFILE || 'not set');"

author: AWS French Podcast Team
